targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS `Total Captures`,

  -- Successful capture count
  SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) = 'payment_captured' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Successful Captures`,

  -- Failed capture count (includes multiple failure events)
  SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) IN ('payment_capture_failed', 'payment_captured.error') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Failed Captures`,

  -- Failed capture percentage
  (SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) IN ('payment_capture_failed', 'payment_captured.error') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) AS `Failed Captures %`,

  -- Successful capture percentage
  (SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) = 'payment_captured' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) AS `Successful Captures %`

FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND JSON_VALUE(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) IN (
    'payment_captured',
    'payment_capture_failed',
    'payment_captured.error'
  )
  AND (
  '$anywhereAccountId' = ''
  OR json_value(json_payload.customerKey) = '$anywhereAccountId'
  );

SELECT
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.paymentProvider) AS `Payment Provider`,

  -- Failed capture percentage
  (SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) IN ('payment_capture_failed', 'payment_captured.error') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) AS `Failed Captures %`

FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND JSON_VALUE(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND JSON_VALUE(labels.event_name) IN (
    'payment_captured',
    'payment_capture_failed',
    'payment_captured.error'
  )
  AND (
  '$anywhereAccountId' = ''
  OR json_value(json_payload.customerKey) = '$anywhereAccountId'
  )
GROUP BY
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.paymentProvider)

panels.description: The total number of Successful payments captures.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    -- Total capture count (successful + failed captures)
  COUNT(*) AS `Total Capture Count`,
  
  json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) AS paymentProvider,
  
  -- Successful capture count
  SUM(CASE WHEN json_value(labels.event_name) = 'payment_captured' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Successful Capture Count`,

  -- Failed capture count (includes multiple failure events)
  SUM(CASE WHEN json_value(labels.event_name) IN ('payment_capture_failed', 'payment_captured.error') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Failed Capture Count`

FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IN ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
  AND json_value(labels.event_name) IN ('payment_captured', 'payment_capture_failed', 'payment_captured.error')
GROUP BY
  paymentProvider

panels.title: Payments capture Success

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.customerKey) `Anywhere Account ID`,
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.paymentProvider) `Payment Provider`,
  timestamp,
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) `Currency`,
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.totalAmount.amount) `Amount`,
  TO_JSON_STRING(json_payload) `Error Details`,
  trace `Trace Id`
FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  severity = 'ERROR'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) in ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
  AND (
  '$anywhereAccountId' = ''
  OR json_value(json_payload.customerKey) = '$anywhereAccountId'
  )
ORDER BY
  timestamp asc
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  timestamp,
  json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) `Payment Provider`,
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.customerKey) `Anywhere Account id`,
  TO_JSON_STRING(json_payload.error) `Error Details`
FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  (json_value(labels.event_name) in ('payment_capture_failed' , 'payment_captured.error'))
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) in ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
  AND (
  '$anywhereAccountId' = ''
  OR json_value(json_payload.customerKey) = '$anywhereAccountId'
  )
ORDER BY
  timestamp desc,
  `Payment Provider`

panels.description: The total number of failed payments captures. This occurs for multiple reasons, e.g. invalid credit card data

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(timestamp, $__interval) AS time,
  json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) AS paymentProvider,
  count(*) AS `Capture Fail Count`,
FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  (json_value(labels.event_name) in ('payment_capture_failed' , 'payment_captured.error'))
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) in ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
GROUP BY
  paymentProvider,
  time
ORDER BY
  time asc

panels.title: Payments capture failed

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp,
  json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) `Payment Provider`,
  JSON_VALUE(json_payload.customerKey) `Anywhere Account id`,
  TO_JSON_STRING(json_payload.error) `Error Details`
FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  (json_value(labels.event_name) in ('checkout.error'))
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) in ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
  AND (
  '$anywhereAccountId' = ''
  OR json_value(json_payload.customerKey) = '$anywhereAccountId'
  )
ORDER BY
  timestamp desc,
  `Payment Provider`

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(timestamp, $__interval) AS time,
  json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) AS paymentProvider,
  count(*) AS `Authorise Fail Count`,
FROM
  `adaptive-payments.events._AllLogs`
WHERE
  (json_value(labels.event_name) in ('checkout.error'))
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND json_value(json_payload.paymentProvider) IN ($paymentProvider)
  AND (json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) in ($currency) OR json_value(json_payload.totalAmount.currency) IS NULL)
GROUP BY
  paymentProvider,
  time
ORDER BY
  paymentProvider,
  time
